local_intent: Perceive the lid, approach and align to it with tight tolerance, then verify the end-effector is at the lid target.
assumptions: Lid is within reachable workspace and visible to the camera.
coherence_with_global: Implements the approach phase of the global plan: detect lid, run ApproachAndAlign(target=lid, tolerance=0.005, timeout_ms=1500), then verify with IsAt before pick.
